content.text: A series of events to accompany the exhibition ‘The Institute of Sexology.’ Join us for intimate discussions and performances with sexologists, artists and historians.
The Institute of Sexology’ exhibition and events programme includes sexual content that some visitors may find disturbing. Those accompanying children may wish to exercise discretion.
'The Institute of Sexology’ will be a place for intimate performances and small group discussions with sexologists, artists and historians.
